s1.message: Default keyboard shortcuts have been changed to Ctrl+Shift+E (preferences) and Ctrl+Shift+V (blockable items) due to conflicts in Firefox 3 and Thunderbird (blog post)

s2.message: "Check banner links" option has been removed (forum thread), element hiding rules should be used as a replacement

s3.message: Whitelisting rules now apply to element hiding rules as well (bug 14814) (won't work properly in Firefox 3, see known issues)

s5.message: Added support for new request types in Firefox 3 like XBL or XMLHttpRequest (documentation)

s6.message: Support for Songbird 0.4 and 0.5 added, now almost everything should work like in Firefox

s10.message: Fixed filter editing issues caused by bug 372769 (Firefox 3 only)

s11.message: Fixed: Links in Adblock Plus dialogs don't open (Thunderbird only)

s12.message: Fixed: Input focus not put back to the filter list after editing a filter (Firefox 3 only)

s13.message: Fixed: The entry "No blockable items on current page" in the list of filter suggestions should not be selectable

s14.message: Fixed: Error messages when inserting filters in Preferences

s15.message: Fixed: Account for new XUL iframe behavior in Firefox 3

s16.message: Content policy now returns "blocked based on server" to trigger special handling in Firefox 3

s17.message: "Flash borders" in list of blockable elements will blink longer (forum thread)

s18.message: Fixed: Keyboard shortcut to close detached list of blockable items is not configurable

s19.message: K-Meleon: Done some major code refactoring

s20.message: K-Meleon: Added support for K-Meleon 1.5 (currently alpha)

s22.message: K-Meleon: Status bar icon now reacts to middle-clicks and has a context menu (K-Meleon 1.5 only)

s24.message: Element hiding hits are not always registered in Firefox 3, this also prevents whitelisting rules to apply to element hiding (bug 425057)

s25.message: Songbird: Context menu doesn't always show up in Songbird, consequently not all items can be blocked via context menu

s26.message: eMusic Remote: Links in Adblock Plus dialogs load in current tab instead of opening a new one
